page.title: 13Sponsored Events.
page.content: A sponsored event is where someone promises to give you a certain amount of money for every part of the event you complete. For example in a sponsored walk a person could promise to pay 10p for every mile completed. In our school during the last year many boys have participated in sponsored events. Here are some examples of the events and their purpose. {Event Purpose } Swimming To buy a school minibus. 24hr.cricket. Physically handicapped. 10 mile walk. Aldershot Baptist Church 2hr.silence. To buy a school minibus. Carol singing.Physically handicapped. Pop Quiz. Help the Aged. Pram Push. Scouts minibus.
